item.description:
Hi all,
Fresh off the heels of the delightful "Shaun of the Dead", a zombie movie spoof, I would have thought that directors Edgar Wright and Simon Pegg newest release would have been a huge hit. So far it has somewhat fizzled at mainstream theaters, what a shame!

"Hot Fuzz" is a send-up and spoof of the Super-Cop genre described by Time Magazine as "The best, surely the smartest, English-language movie of the year to date. "

"Daft 'Hot Fuzz' relocates Hollywood cop-movie excesses to the quaint English countryside " The Baltimore Sun
Here is a link to their full review:
http://www.baltimores...

The movie starts at 4 pm and if the weatherman is kind, hopefully we can dine al fresco afterwards and enjoy a frivolous but fun discussion afterward.

As is the custom, Tom will be holding a meetup sign after the movie near the front row. For this one ,the managers of the restaurant have asked that all guns be checked beforehand.
item.name: Hot Fuzz , A British Comedy at Kendall
